attributes.title: Save yourself
attributes.review: At first the process of downloading this app was incredibly fast and I was amazed with the technological advancement. But! then, as I opened the app I was surprised to see that a pseudo-Hitler image of a sickly orange man appear on my screen. And then I looked up and saw that this man was a cult leader, for an America that is undeniably terrible, and it was trying to coerce me to join a hate group. As a person with morals, I must say that this app is should be censored by the United States government, as it violates my eyes and my phone.
